languages.text: Одно из возможных свойств посоха навигатора, всегда имеющее после себя цифровое значение (например, разрушение 10). Первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}времени на восстановление{/g} этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит целям дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный значению разрушения, и столько же прямого урона самому навигатору.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.
languages.original_text: Одно из возможных свойств посоха навигатора, всегда имеющее после себя цифровое значение (например, разрушение 10). Первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}времени на восстановление{/g} этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит целям дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный значению разрушения, и столько же прямого урона самому навигатору.

traits.locale_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff that is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff that is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

languages.text: Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Verheerend 10). Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe des Verheerend-Parameters und dem Navigator denselben Schaden als Direktschaden zu.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Verheerend 10). Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe des Verheerend-Parameters und dem Navigator denselben Schaden als Direktschaden zu.

Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Verheerend 10). Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe des Verheerend-Parameters und dem Navigator denselben Schaden als Direktschaden zu.

languages.text: L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Dévastation 10. Chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à la valeur du paramètre Dévastation à toutes les cibles et le même nombre de points de dégâts directs au navigateur.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Dévastation 10. Chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à la valeur du paramètre Dévastation à toutes les cibles et le même nombre de points de dégâts directs au navigateur.

L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Dévastation 10. Chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à la valeur du paramètre Dévastation à toutes les cibles et le même nombre de points de dégâts directs au navigateur.

languages.text: Uno de los posibles parámetros de un báculo de navegante. Siempre viene seguido de un valor numérico (por ejemplo, Devastación 10). El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional igual al parámetro de devastación a todos los objetivos y otro tanto de daño directo al navegante.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los posibles parámetros de un báculo de navegante. Siempre viene seguido de un valor numérico (por ejemplo, Devastación 10). El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional igual al parámetro de devastación a todos los objetivos y otro tanto de daño directo al navegante.

languages.text: 航宙士の杖に付属可能なパラメータの1つ。常に数値が続く（例：壊滅 10）。1ターンに1度だけ、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し壊滅パラメーターと同等の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をすべてのターゲットに与え、および航宙士に対して同等の直接ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の杖に付属可能なパラメータの1つ。常に数値が続く（例：壊滅 10）。1ターンに1度だけ、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し壊滅パラメーターと同等の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をすべてのターゲットに与え、および航宙士に対して同等の直接ダメージを与える。

languages.text: 导航者法杖可能包含的其中一项属性值，此属性带有强度数值（如“毁灭10”）。每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于毁灭属性值。此外，导航者本人也会承受同等直击伤害。
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: 导航者法杖可能包含的其中一项属性值，此属性带有强度数值（如“毁灭10”）。每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于毁灭属性值。此外，导航者本人也会承受同等直击伤害。

languages.text: Rotacı asalarının muhtemel parametrelerinden biri. Bu parametreyi her zaman sayısal bir değer takip eder (örneğin yıkıcı 10). Tek bir turda saldırı amaçlı bir Rotacı gücünün ilk kullanımı, gücü {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown} süresine{/g} sokmaz ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz. Aynı turda bu gücün ikinci kez veya saldırı amaçlı başka bir Rotacı gücünün kullanımı, tüm hedeflere yıkıcı parametresi kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirken Rotacı da yine aynı miktarda doğrudan hasara maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, devastating 10). The first use of an attacking Navigator power in a single turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.
